name: Illume (aakashsrivastava1612)
description:
Game Plot: The sun has died, can you restore its energy by guiding the last beam of light to it.

Game Play: Guide the light through the rooms by opening the door in each level. Use the click and drag functions of the mouse to explore the scene through mirrors.

The game was designed and developed as part of our Design Project - 1 module of the 2 year M.Des in Toy and Game Design programme at the National Institute of Design, Gandhinagar. The game is designed by Aakash Srivastava & Srishti Singh, Toy and Game Design, Batch - 2018.
